dcterms:description: Microsoft COCO is a widely used benchmark for multi-label image recognition. It contains 82,081 images as the training set and 40,504 images as the validation set. The objects are categorized into 80 classes with about 2.9 object labels per image.
dcterms:title: MS-COCO

dcterms:creator: Mark Everingham
Luc Van Gool
Christopher KI Williams
John Winn
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: PASCAL Visual Object Classes Challenge (VOC 2007) is a popular dataset for multi-label recognition. It contains 9,963 images from 20 object categories, which is divided into train, val and test sets.
dcterms:title: VOC 2007
